whyMyValuation.headline: Why My Valuation is Different
whyMyValuation.body: Online estimates miss what makes your home special — the renovated kitchen, the extra half-acre, the school district premium, the quiet cul-de-sac. My in-person analysis accounts for every factor that online algorithms ignore. 18 years of Westchester sales means I know exactly what today's buyers will pay for your specific property.
